Class User

java.lang.Object
database.model.BaseEntity
database.model.entities.User
public class User extends BaseEntity
Represents a user in the system with personal and role-based information.

This class stores user details including username, first name, last name, password (hashed), email address, and user roles. It extends BaseEntity to inherit a unique ID.

Author:
Dhruv

  • Constructor Details

    • User

      public User()
      Default constructor for User. Initializes a new instance of the User class.

    • User

      public User(String userName, String firstName, String lastName, String password, String email, int roles)
      Constructs a new User with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      userName - The username for the user.
      firstName - The user's first name.
      lastName - The user's last name.
      password - The user's password (plain text initially).
      email - The user's email address.
      roles - The user's roles represented as an integer.
